title: Mater Terrae
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Italian, Japanese, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Catering, European
description: A vegetarian restaurant, part of the 5-star luxury Hotel Raphael 5, is situated in the heart of historic Rome, just behind the famous Piazza Navona. The triple level rooftop restaurant provides a 360Â° panoramic view. Uses strictly seasonal and mainly organic and biodynamic ingredients; uses no eggs. Chef is Fabrizio Marino. The menu changed to organic and vegetarian with some vegan and raw items in April 2013.
